word: H7106 - קָצַע - qâtsaʻ - kaw-tsah' - Cause to scrape - சுரண்டச் செய்

sections.paragraph: சுருக்க விளக்கம் / Short Definition: Cause to scrape / சுரண்டச் செய்
1) to scrape, to scrape off, to cut off; (Hiphil) to scrape
2) to be cornered, to be set in corners; (Hophal) to cut off places, to make corners
ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: A primitive root; to strip off, that is, (partially) scrape; by implication to segregate (as an angle): - cause to scrape, corner.
Cognate: H4740, H4741, H4742, H7102, H7103, H7106
